MatchedRegions.transcript: Our work is motivated by accumulative poisoning attack, which utilizes the sequential order property of real-time data streaming for sneaky poisoning generation.

MatchedRegion.Text: As the accumulative poisoning attack utilize the sequential order property of real-time data streaming for sneaky poisoning generation, we raise the following question:

MatchedRegions.transcript: Can we also explore the information of model dynamics to gain some useful clues to identify the imperceptible accumulative poisoning attacks?
